trans-unit.source: Implements the basic functionality required of a service for providing access to a data source at the <xref uid="langword_csharp_EnvDTE.Project" name="EnvDTE.Project" href=""></xref> level.
trans-unit.target: 实现用于提供对中的数据源的访问的服务所需的基本功能<xref uid="langword_csharp_EnvDTE.Project" name="EnvDTE.Project" href=""></xref>级别。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceProviderService"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceProviderService"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, creates and returns an instance of the given data source, and adds it to the design surface.
trans-unit.target: 当在派生类中重写，创建并返回一个给定的数据源的实例并将其添加到设计图面。

trans-unit.source: You should only call the AddDataSourceInstance method on data sources that are designable for example, if the<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceDescriptor.IsDesignable%2A> value is `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果应调用 AddDataSourceInstance 方法对数据源，例如，可设计仅<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceDescriptor.IsDesignable%2A>值是`true`。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceDescriptor.IsDesignable%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method enables the service implementer to perform custom actions when a data source is added to the design surface.
trans-unit.target: 此方法可实现服务实施者的数据源添加到设计图面时执行自定义操作。

trans-unit.source: The designer host.
trans-unit.target: 设计器宿主中。

trans-unit.source: The data source.
trans-unit.target: 数据源。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> representing an instance of the added data source.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object>表示添加的数据源的实例。</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: The type name cannot be created or resolved.
trans-unit.target: 无法创建或解决的类型名称。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, retrieves the collection of data sources at the <xref uid="langword_csharp_EnvDTE.Project" name="EnvDTE.Project" href=""></xref> level.
trans-unit.target: 当在派生类中重写，检索在数据源的集合<xref uid="langword_csharp_EnvDTE.Project" name="EnvDTE.Project" href=""></xref>级别。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceGroupCollection"></xref>, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if there are no data sources at the <xref uid="langword_csharp_EnvDTE.Project" name="EnvDTE.Project" href=""></xref> level.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceGroupCollection"> </xref>，或<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>如果没有在数据源<xref uid="langword_csharp_EnvDTE.Project" name="EnvDTE.Project" href=""></xref>级别。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, invokes the **Add New Data Source Wizard**.
trans-unit.target: 当在派生类中重写，将调用**添加新数据源向导**。

trans-unit.source: The parent window.
trans-unit.target: 父窗口中。

trans-unit.source: The initial position of a form.
trans-unit.target: 窗体的初始位置。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceGroup"></xref> collection of newly added data sources, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if no data sources are added.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceGroup"> </xref>新添加的数据源的集合或<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>如果没有数据源添加。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, invokes the **Configure Data Source** dialog box on the specified data source.
trans-unit.target: 当在派生类中重写，将调用**配置数据源**对话框中，在指定的数据源。

trans-unit.source: The parent window.
trans-unit.target: 父窗口中。

trans-unit.source: The initial position of a form.
trans-unit.target: 窗体的初始位置。

trans-unit.source: The data source.
trans-unit.target: 数据源。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if any changes were made to that data source; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果已对该数据源，则任何更改否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The specified data source is invalid or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 指定的数据源无效或<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, notifies the service that a component representing a data source was added to the design surface.
trans-unit.target: 当在派生类中重写，通知服务表示数据源的组件已添加到设计图面。

trans-unit.source: The data source component.
trans-unit.target: 数据源组件。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets the value indicating whether the service supports adding a new data source using <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceProviderService.InvokeAddNewDataSource*>.
trans-unit.target: 当在派生类中重写，获取值，该值指示服务是否支持添加新数据源使用<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceProviderService.InvokeAddNewDataSource*>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceProviderService.InvokeAddNewDataSource*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the service supports adding a new data source using <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceProviderService.InvokeAddNewDataSource*>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果该服务支持添加新的数据源使用<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceProviderService.InvokeAddNewDataSource*>; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceProviderService.InvokeAddNewDataSource*>

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets the value indicating whether the service supports configuring data sources using <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceProviderService.InvokeConfigureDataSource*>.
trans-unit.target: 当在派生类中重写，获取值，该值指示服务是否支持使用<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceProviderService.InvokeConfigureDataSource*>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceProviderService.InvokeConfigureDataSource*>的配置数据源

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the service supports configuring a data source using <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceProviderService.InvokeConfigureDataSource*>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果该服务支持配置数据源使用<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceProviderService.InvokeConfigureDataSource*>; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DataSourceProviderService.InvokeConfigureDataSource*>
